name: Trainyard Trouble
description:
Welcome to Trainyard Trouble!

Your job is it to deliver cargo and passengers to different places. Just make sure your cargo hold doesn't overflow.

Every type of train car takes a different amount of time to arrive where it needs to be. You can see how long it takes by looking at the little dots under the icons in your cargo hold. You can stack up to three of containers of the same type.

Have fun!
